| icon           = poe2 ring_stone_red icon.png
| description    = Set into this ring is a chunk of stained glass from Halgot's Citadel, also known as Godhammer Citadel. The glass is warm to the touch. Given to you by the Eothasian priest, Pitli, for aiding in her mission to care for the afflicted, this ring represents renewal and compassion for the downtrodden.
